content: {"name": "Detroit's Bread of Life", "alternate_name": "", "description": "Detroit's Bread of Life is a community Food Pantry (future base kitchen 2013) serving the residents of Detroit's lower eastside.\n\nThey provide weekly community dinner on Sundays 12:30 PM at St. Charles Borremeo Church 1491 Baldwin Detroit, MI 48214.", "email": "", "url": "https://www.freefood.org/l/mi_48214_detroits-bread-of-life", "status": "active", "address": {"address_1": "2942 Baldwin Street", "address_2": null, "city": "Islandview", "state_province": "MI", "postal_code": "48214", "country": "US"}, "location": {"latitude": 42.3624909, "longitude": -83.00615499999999}}
